title: Continuous Compliance Evidence (CCE) Input Schema
description: Schema for CCE JSON payloads generated by the KSI_Engine.

id.description: Unique identifier for the compliance finding.

finding_type.description: The type of compliance finding (e.g., NIST control).

severity.description: The original severity of the finding.

asset_id.description: The identifier of the affected asset.

description.description: A technical description of the compliance finding.

tags.description: Tags associated with the asset or finding for context.
